00020 #ifndef RDK2_RGRAPHICS_RC8SET
00021 #define RDK2_RGRAPHICS_RC8SET
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/object/object.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/rgraphics/rimage.h>
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00027 
00028     class RC8Set : public RDK2::Object {
00029         public:
00030             RC8Set() : mask(0) { }
00031             RC8Set(uint8_t initialMask) : mask(initialMask) { }
00032             virtual ~RC8Set() { }
00033         
00034             RDK2_DEFAULT_CLONE(RC8Set);
00035             virtual void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException);
00036             virtual void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException);
00037         
00038             inline bool contains(uint8_t color) const { return (color & mask); }
00039             inline void set(RImage::C8Color color) { mask |= color; }
00040             inline void unset(RImage::C8Color color) { mask &= ~color; }
00041             inline void clear() { mask = 0; }
00042         
00043         private:
00044             uint8_t mask;
00045     };
00046 
00047 }} // namespace
00048 
00049 #endif
